definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: sated, satisfied, surfeited ;—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Ge 25:8, Pr 19:23 ; cstr. [[שְׂבַע]] De 33:23 +; fs. [[שְׂבֵעָה]] Pr 27:7; mpl. [[שְׂבֵעִים]] 1Sa 2:5;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: sated with food, c. [[בַּלֶּחֶם]] 1Sa 2:5; [[נֶפֶשׁ שְׂבֵעָה]] Pr 27:7 (opp. [[רְעֵבָה]] ´[[נ]]: ); abounding in ´[[י]]:’s favour ([[שְׂבַע רָחוֹן]]) De 33:23 (‖[[מָלֵא ]]); abs. satisfied Pr 19:23.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in phr. [[שְׂבַע יָמִים]] satisfied with days, in a good old age, Ge 35:29 (P), Job 42:17 (both + [[זׇקֵן]]), 1Ch 29:28 (+ [[בְּשֵׂיבָה טוֹבָה]]), also abs. [[שָׂבֵָעַ]] Ge 25:8 (P; + id. + [[זׇקֵן]])
bad sense, surfeited with trouble etc.: [[שְׂבַע רׂגֶז]] Job 14:1, [[קָלוֹן]] ´[[שׂ]]: Job 10:15.
